description.value:
By stimulating air molecules, you create a zone of Force-enhanced fire on ground that you can see within range. Until the power ends, the enhanced fire fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the fire's space when you cast the power must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take [[/r 1d8]] energy damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the fire's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

The fire ignites flammable objects in its area that aren't being worn or carried.

The power's damage increases by [[/r 1d8]] when you reach 5th level ([[/r 2d8]]), 11th level ([[/r 3d8]]), and 17th level ([[/r 4d8]]).
